com.isbx.locationtools

Class StaticMapUriBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.isbx.locationtools.StaticMapUriBuilder

  • public class StaticMapUriBuilder
extends Object

    A convenience class for utilizing Google's Static Maps API. An instance of this class can be used to configure and create a Uri representing a request to the Static Maps API for the appropriate map image. The Static Maps API returns an image file, so the uri can be used directly with any remote image loading library.

    Note: A Google developer account and API key are required to use the Static Maps API.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String MAP_TYPE_HYBRID
      Map type that displays a combination of the roadmap and satellite images.
      static String MAP_TYPE_ROADMAP
      Map type that displays the standard map ui as normally shown on the Google Maps website.
      static String MAP_TYPE_SATELLITE
      Map type that displays a satellite image.
      static String MAP_TYPE_TERRAIN
      Map type that displays a physical relief map.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      StaticMapUriBuilder(String apiKey)
      Creates a new StaticMapUriBuilder that will use the given API key for any requests it creates.

        height - The desired height in pixels of the map image

      • setCenter

                                     double lng)
        Sets the geographical center of the requested map image. The center parameter is required unless setPathPoints(List) is set.
        Parameters:
        lat - The desired latitude of the center of the map image
        lng - The desired longitude of the center of the map image
        Returns:
        This builder object for method chaining
        See Also:

      • setFormat

        public StaticMapUriBuilder setFormat(String format)
        Sets the graphics format of the map image. Defaults to 8-bit png.
        Parameters:
        format - The graphics format, must be one of "png", "png8", "png32", "gif", "jpg", "jpg-baseline"
        Returns:
        This builder object for method chaining

      • setMapType

        public StaticMapUriBuilder setMapType(String mapType)
        Sets the map type of the requested map image. If omitted, this defaults to "roadmap".

        For more information on different map types, see https://developers.google.com/maps/documentation/static-maps/intro#MapTypes.

        Parameters:
        mapType - The desired map type of the map image, must be one of MAP_TYPE_ROADMAP, MAP_TYPE_SATELLITE, MAP_TYPE_TERRAIN, or MAP_TYPE_HYBRID
        Returns:
        This builder object for method chaining

      • setPathWeight

        public StaticMapUriBuilder setPathWeight(int weight)
        Sets the weight of the polyline that will be drawn if setPathPoints(List) is set. Defaults to 5.
        Parameters:
        weight - The thickness of the polyline in pixels
        Returns:
        This builder object for method chaining
        See Also:
        setPathPoints(List)

      • setPathColor

        public StaticMapUriBuilder setPathColor(String color)
        Sets the color of the polyline that will be drawn if setPathPoints(List) is set. Defaults to the standard blue color used by Google Maps.
        Parameters:
        color - A string specifying either a color name of the set {"black", "brown", "green", "purple", "yellow", "blue", "gray", "orange", "red", "white"} or a 24-bit or 32-bit hexadecimal color value (eg "0xFFFFFFFF")
        Returns:
        This builder object for method chaining
        See Also:
        setPathPoints(List)

      • setPathFillColor

        public StaticMapUriBuilder setPathFillColor(String fillColor)
        Sets a color to be used to fill the enclosed space of the polyline that will be drawn if setPathPoints(List) is set. Defaults to no fill color.
        Parameters:
        fillColor - A string specifying either a color name of the set {"black", "brown", "green", "purple", "yellow", "blue", "gray", "orange", "red", "white"} or a 24-bit or 32-bit hexadecimal color value (eg "0xFFFFFFFF")
        Returns:
        This builder object for method chaining
        See Also:
        setPathPoints(List)

      • setPathPoints

        public StaticMapUriBuilder setPathPoints(List<com.google.android.gms.maps.model.LatLng> points)
        Defines a list of points to use to draw a polyline on the requested map image. If a path is set, you do not need to set setZoom(int) or setCenter(LatLng), and the map image will zoom and pan to fit the path as necessary.

        Note that there is a 8192 character limit on the length of Static Maps url requests, and setting a excessively long path is an easy way to exceed this limit.

        Parameters:
        points - A List of LatLngs representing the points on the path to draw
        Returns:
        This builder object for method chaining

      • build

        public Uri build()
        Constructs a Uri pointing to the Static Maps API with the parameters configured in this builder instance.
        Returns:
        A fully configured Uri
